name: Hiscores! Gold
description:
"Adorable" - Jim Sterling

"There for you to enjoy" - Jim Sterling

"Funny" - Jim Sterling

"Brilliant" - Jim Sterling

This... is Hiscores! Gold.

A premium re-imagining of a previous AIU game, with just a few small differences: a nice big gold button to press and a pleasing "cha-ching" sound effect every 100 points.

Everything is deliberate. Gameplay has been stripped down to the basic elements - interact with the button, observe your score score increase, but don't dither too long or you'll reset to zero. Purity of esscence.

I believe this pure game is worth nearly $200. Who are you to tell me otherwise?
